field.description: Suppress those terms only having one article.

field.description: Show Hits Number as prompt.

field.name: MaxTagsNumber
field.label: Max Tags Number
field.description: Show the number of tags at most. When having tags more than the number, we just ignore them.

field.name: RelatedArticlesByTags
field.label: Show Related Articles By Tags
field.description: Show Related Articles By Tags.

field.name: RelatedArticlesCountByTags
field.label: Related Articles Count
field.description: The number of related articles by tags.

field.name: RelatedArticlesTitleByTags
field.label: Related Articles Title
field.description: The related articles title.

field.name: IgnoeNumericTags
field.label: Ignore numeric tags
field.description: Ignoe numeric tags, this option only applies to tags importing.

field.name: MinTagLength
field.label: Min Tag Length
field.description: Ignore those tags which have less characters than this number,this option only applies to tags importing.

field.name: interval
field.label: interval
field.description: Interval between animation frames, in milliseconds

field.name: maxSpeed
field.label: maxSpeed
field.description: Maximum speed of rotation

field.name: minSpeed
field.label: minSpeed
field.description: Minimum speed of rotation when mouse leaves canvas

field.name: decel
field.label: decel
field.description: Deceleration rate when mouse leaves canvas

field.name: minBrightness
field.label: minBrightness
field.description: Brightness of tags at farthest point (0.0-1.0)

field.name: textColour
field.label: textColour
field.description: Colour of the tag text - empty string or null to use the colour of the original link.

field.name: textHeight
field.label: textHeight
field.description: Height of the tag text font (in pixels)

field.name: textFont
field.label: textFont
field.description: Font family for the tag text - empty string or null to use the font of the original link.

field.name: outlineColour
field.label: outlineColour
field.description: Colour of the active tag highlight

field.name: outlineMethod
field.label: aa
field.description: Type of highlight to use. Options are outline for an outline at the same depth as the active tag, classic for the old-style outline on top of all tags, block for a solid block around the active tag and colour to change the colour of the text or image of the current tag to the outlineColour value.

field.name: outlineThickness
field.label: outlineThickness
field.description: Thickness of outline in pixels

field.name: outlineOffset
field.label: zoomStep
field.description: Distance of outline from text, in pixels. This also increases the size of the active area around the tag.

field.name: pulsateTo
field.label: pulsateTo
field.description: Pulsate outline to this opacity (0.0-1.0)

field.name: pulsateTime
field.label: pulsateTime
field.description: Pulse rate, in seconds per beat

field.name: depth
field.label: depth
field.description: Controls the perspective (0.0-1.0)

field.name: initial
field.label: initial
field.description: Initial rotation, with horizontal and vertical as an array, e.g. [0.8,-0.3]. Values are multiplied by maxSpeed.

field.name: freezeActive
field.label: freezeActive
field.description: Set to true to pause movement when a tag is highlighted.

field.name: activeCursor
field.label: activeCursor
field.description: The CSS cursor type to use when the mouse is over a tag.

field.name: frontSelect
field.label: frontSelect
field.description: Set to true to prevent selection of tags at back of cloud.

field.name: txtOpt
field.label: txtOpt
field.description: Text optimisation, converts text tags to images for better performance.

field.name: txtScale
field.label: txtScale
field.description: Scaling factor of text when converting to image in txtOpt mode.

field.name: reverse
field.label: Reverse
field.description: Set to true to reverse direction of movement relative to mouse position.

field.name: hideTags
field.label: Hide Tags
field.description: Set to true to automatically hide the tag list element if TagCanvas is started successfully.

field.name: zoom
field.label: zoom
field.description: Adjusts the relative size of the tag cloud in the canvas. Larger values will zoom into the cloud, smaller values will zoom out.

field.name: wheelZoom
field.label: wheelZoom
field.description: Enables zooming the cloud in and out using the mouse wheel or scroll gesture.

field.name: zoomStep
field.label: zoomStep
field.description: The amount that the zoom is changed by with each movement of the mouse wheel.

field.name: zoomMax
field.label: zoomMax
field.description: Maximum zoom value.

field.name: zoomMin
field.label: zoomMin
field.description: Minimum zoom value.

field.name: shadow
field.label: shadow
field.description: Colour of the shadow behind each tag.

field.name: shadowBlur
field.label: shadowBlur
field.description: Amount of tag shadow blurring, in pixels.

field.name: shadowOffset
field.label: shadowOffset
field.description: X and Y offset of the tag shadow, in pixels.

field.name: weight
field.label: Weight
field.description: Set to true to turn on weighting of tags.

field.name: weightMode
field.label: weightMode
field.description: Method to use for displaying tag weights. Should be one of size, colour or both. The default - canvas tags are shown using the font size of the original tag link. Both: Uses 'size' and 'colour' on the tags at the same time.

field.name: weightSize
field.label: weightSize
field.description: Multiplier for adjusting the size of tags when using a weight mode of size or both.

field.name: weightGradient
field.label: weightGradient
field.description: The colour gradient used for colouring tags when using a weight mode of colour or both.

field.name: weightFrom
field.label: weightFrom
field.description: The link attribute to take the tag weight from. The default of null means that the weight is taken from the calculated link font size.

field.name: shape
field.label: shape
field.description: The shape of the cloud. Currently supported are sphere, hcylinder for a cylinder that starts off horizontal and vcylinder for a cylinder that starts off vertical.

field.name: lock
field.label: lock
field.description: A value of 'x' limits rotation of the cloud to the (horizontal) x-axis, and a value of 'y' limits rotation to the (vertical) y-axis. (These are strings, so the quotes are required)

field.name: tooltip
field.label: tooltip
field.description: Sets tooltip display method: null for no tooltips; native for operating system tooltips; div for div-based.

field.name: tooltipClass
field.label: tooltipClass
field.description: Class of tooltip div.

field.name: tooltipDelay
field.label: aa
field.description: Time to pause while mouse is not moving before displaying tooltip div, in milliseconds.

field.name: radiusX
field.label: radiusX
field.description: Initial size of cloud from centre to sides.

field.name: radiusY
field.label: radiusY
field.description: Initial size of cloud from centre to top and bottom.

field.name: radiusZ
field.label: radiusZ
field.description: Initial size of cloud from centre to front and back.

field.name: stretchX
field.label: stretchX
field.description: Stretch or compress the cloud horizontally.

field.name: stretchY
field.label: stretchY
field.description: Stretch or compress the cloud vertically.

field.name: shuffleTags
field.label: shuffleTags
field.description: Set to true to randomize the order of the tags.

field.name: noSelect
field.label: noSelect
field.description: Set to true to prevent the selection of tags.

field.name: noMouse
field.label: noMouse
field.description: Set to true to prevent any mouse interaction. The initial option must be used to animate the cloud, otherwise it will be motionless.
